branchCategory.name: FGC
branchCategory.description: <p>Suitable for high flow rate filtration, the FGC industrial filter series can be used for a wide range of applications.&nbsp; The series offers a variety of elements that can be selected according to the filtration conditions.&nbsp; Vertical structure of the FGC allows little loss of filtrate.</p>
